title: In The Shadow Of Our Pale Companion

description:
on the last measures, before each repetitions, it like this in the actual tab :

B -0-------
G ---2-----
D -----2-0-

But it clearly sounds better when replacing the last 0 on the D string by a 3 on the A string, like this :

B -0-------
G ---2-----
D -----2---
A --------3
title: In The Shadow Of Our Pale Companion
